location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Bazett Doveton, Deputy Accountant General, Military Department of Accounts, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The first word of each line of the bottom half of the letter has been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the office of Pay Officer General was abolished on 1 January 1817 and that he should contact the Accountant General at the Military Department for his military payments.
